summary: The agent report is generally accurate with good metric precision but lacks completeness in causal chain and root cause identification.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent identified MMDVFS as a root cause but did not mention CM or PowerHal.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the DDR impact on VCORE but missed the CM and CPU links.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent accurately reported VCORE and DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is mostly logical but lacks clarity on ruling out other causes.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but lack specific historical context.
